solution_line_template: In the first stretch he drove {speed_first_stretch} miles/hour x {time_first_stretch} hours = <<{speed_first_stretch}*{time_first_stretch}={distance_first_stretch}>>{distance_first_stretch} miles

In the second stretch he drove {speed_second_stretch} miles/hour x {time_second_stretch} hours = <<{speed_second_stretch}*{time_second_stretch}={distance_second_stretch}>>{distance_second_stretch} miles
After the gas station he drove {speed_third_stretch} miles/hour x {time_third_stretch} hours = <<{speed_third_stretch}*{time_third_stretch}={distance_third_stretch}>>{distance_third_stretch} miles

In total he drove {distance_first_stretch} miles + {distance_second_stretch} miles + {distance_third_stretch} miles = <<{distance_first_stretch}+{distance_second_stretch}+{distance_third_stretch}={total_distance}>>{total_distance} miles
